ticket.title: has_many :through does not respect select clause of scopes
ticket.original-body:
[If you have a select clause on a scope, it is overridden by if the scope is on a hmt.](http://www.timocracy.com/2009/06/15/workaround-for-has_many-through-overriding-the-select-clause)
I'm attaching a test for this. If I can, I will try and come up with a fixing patch, but I know the hmt logic has some edge-cases.

If you have a select clause on a scope, it is overridden by if the scope is on a hmt.

I'm attaching a test for this. If I can, I will try and come up with a fixing patch, but I know the hmt logic has some edge-cases.
